code: var averageValue=function averageValue(min,max){return Math.round((min+max)/2);};var parsToTemperature=function parsToTemperature(data){var result=data.list.map(function(item){return{name:item.dt_txt.slice(8,10),temperature:averageValue(item.main.temp_min,item.main.temp_max)};});return result;};export{parsToTemperature};
